artefact: Hackney carriage vehicle licence (England, Scotland and Wales)

artefact.overview: You need a licence to run or own a hackney carriage
artefact.licence_short_description: You need a licence to run or own a hackney carriage.
artefact.licence_overview: If you own or run a hackney carriage (taxicab), it needs to be inspected and licensed by the local authority. This applies to England (excluding London), Scotland and Wales.
